price: 83. Y la Última Morada (del paraíso) será para quienes no buscan ser altivos en la tierra ni quieren corromperla. Y el buen final (en la otra vida) será para los piadosos (que temen a Al-lah).
arabic: تِلۡكَ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ نَجۡعَلُهَا لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُرِيدُونَ عُلُوّٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فَسَادٗاۚ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: til'ka al-dāru al-ākhiratu najʿaluhā lilladhīna lā yurīdūna ʿuluwwan fī al-arḍi walā fasādan wal-ʿāqibatu lil'muttaqīna
